Who am I?

Hi!, I'm Kevin Christopher Morco a graduate at Laguna State Polytechnic University. I do love programming and creating web designs and their corresponding functionalities

I have strong attention to details and willingly to collaborate for the success of every project, also willing to try new things especially on tech stacks to enhance my skills further.
